summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of North 59th Street, from Phinney Avenue to Whitman Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7469of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
